channel.title: Making my first script
channel.description:
I need some help making my first script
What i want it to do is
Start on entrana fill 7 buckets of sand pick up 20 seaweed cook 20 seaweed make 7 molten glass make 7 oil lamps then fill up 7 buckets of sand make 7 molten glass make 7 oil lamps and that on a loop
i need to know how to do it
so i can out the co ords in to walk and where to click etc.
please can someone help me
Thanks alot
Bielby

item.title: Making my first script
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

exps35:

I think thats a little far-fetched for a first script.

It’s actually one of the more easier scripts, there’s no major walking, the sandpit is a very unique color on the map and in the real game screen, seaweed might be a problem but it’s slightly more aqua so it wouldn’t be hard, cooking has a map symbol and so does the furnace.

I suggest you learn about dtms, use them to walk(register to SRL Forums to find the FindDTMRotated tutorial), and take a look at some FindSymbol functions.

Read full topic

item.title: Making my first script
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

I think thats a little far-fetched for a first script.

You might want to start with reading tutorials, and learning to script.
Judging by your posts, you don’t know much about SCAR, so you should try to familiarize yourself with it before trying something of this magnitude. Theres alot more involved in this script than you think.

Read full topic

item.description:
